reviews.review: Recomand acest joc dar as vrea sa se evalueze overwatch

This game is what ruined Team Fortress 2. Its success led Valve to shamelessly copy its features into TF2, as an attempt to squeeze out more money. This included the weapon skins, the cases with rarity tiers, the contract campaigns, and ultimately the irreversible disaster that was matchmaking.

For that reason, I will never properly review the game. It does not earn a single fucking ounce of respect from me. If I want to play a multiplayer Counter-Strike game, I will just keep playing CS Source.
CSGO最廉价的是什么 是扔呲在房顶的烟 被AK换下的咖喱还是没有人起的新星，可扔在房顶的烟，也会被注目观看，被换下的咖喱，也许也会被保枪的ct捡起，新星也会在peek中大放光彩，只有我的爱一文不值
Old but Gold.. Still the anti-cheat system can't get any worse xD
always a legend games, awesome. some are toxic but play w ur friends every games so it make game funnier..
gosto muito desse jogo apesar de ter perdido minha outra conta.

Good game but when you first start don't mind the people yelling at you but sometimes you may find some nice people, and i am 3 steam points off of something I want I would be very grateful If someone could gift points to me
Old, gameplay is solid, bright future
喜欢 能认识很多人 但是女孩子也要小心 别被骗感情 男孩子别被骗钱
Kicsit sok a csaló, de ennek ellenére élvezhető játék.

Why do I have to use the statistically worse weapon compared to the one shot headshot ak for half the game. DOESNT MATTER IF IM SIMPLY BETTER AND HEADSHOT FIRST BULLET WITH THE FIRST SHOT OF THE FIGHT. HE HAS AK HE ONE TAP I DONT.
GREAT COMMUNITY VERY WELCOMING AND SFW
Easy to learn, hard to master. Great game.

A steam fiscaliza muito pouco os usuários com hack. Portanto, você vai se deparar em todas as partidas com alguém usando ALL e auxilio de mira.

这游戏是真的好玩，已经被对面当鸡杀了
mostly pain and then u get that one bizon ace that makes you keep going

It can be better like any game, but it has given me so much good memories and bad ones too ofc. Best thing valve could do is to get better anti cheat and mabye fix some stuff in your game other then that good shooter.

It's one of the worst games I've played to date on steam. If you don't have a good keyboard and mouse, it's useless to play it. It is not useful to configure a controller and not to mention that it is difficult to level up. 

Es de los peores juegos que he probado al dia de hoy en steam. Sino tenes buen teclado y mouse no sirve para jugarlo. No sirve para configurar un mando y sin contar que es dificil subir de nivel.
es counter que mas queres padreee

Es un juego que crashea constantemente en los cambios de mapa y nunca lo arreglan con las 58 actualizaciones que le hacen, por día, al juego. Y eso que soy prime, hay gente que paga por este juego y no les brinda nada en absoluto. Lo más satisfactorio del juego fue desinstalarlo.
